atlantis.framework.graphics

Class SpriteBatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • atlantis.framework.graphics.SpriteBatch

  • public class SpriteBatch
extends java.lang.Object
    A sprite batch is responsible to draw image and text on screen.
    Author:
    Yannick
